CustomField.formula: (NOT(Handle = "Eurostar") || NOT(Handle = "EurostarUK") || NOT(Handle = "eurostarfr")) && (NOT( CONTAINS(Name, "from: Eurostar") || CONTAINS(Name, "From: Eurostar") || CONTAINS(Name, "from EurostarUK") || CONTAINS(Name, "from Eurostar") || CONTAINS (Name, "FROM: Eurostar") || CONTAINS (Name, "from eurostarfr")))
CustomField.label: Inbound Contact
